name: @crrice/connect-copy
description: CLI tool to copy contact flows and supporting resources between Amazon Connect instances.

scripts.compile-test-utils: tsc --outDir test-utils/dist --module NodeNext --target ES2022 --moduleResolution NodeNext --esModuleInterop --declaration --declarationMap --sourceMap --rootDir test-utils test-utils/assertions.ts test-utils/auth.ts test-utils/content.ts test-utils/flows.ts

author: Conor Rice
